headline: Crockpot Italian Chicken
name: Crockpot Italian Chicken
description: Chicken breasts, Italian dressing, and Parmesan cheese are all you need for this three-ingredient crockpot Italian chicken to be ready to eat when you get home.
recipeIngredient: 1 (16 ounce) bottle Italian dressing (such as Olive Garden℠ Signature Italian Dressing)

recipeInstructions.text: Stir Italian dressing and Parmesan cheese together in a bowl.
Place chicken in a slow cooker, and pour dressing mixture over chicken. Cover and cook on Low until chicken is tender, no longer pink in the center, and the juices run clear, about 8 hours.
